scripts.build:mac: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('dist/mac', { recursive: true, force: true })" && cross-env USE_HARD_LINKS=false electron-builder --mac --publish never -c.directories.output=dist/mac
scripts.build:win: npm run rebuild:server && npm run build:icon:win && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('dist/win', { recursive: true, force: true })" && cross-env USE_HARD_LINKS=false electron-builder --win --x64 --publish never -c.directories.output=dist/win
scripts.prebuild:win: npm run rebuild:server && npm run build:icon:win
